job.title: Data Scientist - Sam's Club
job.description: ltstronggtltugtPosition Summary What Youll DoltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtData Scientists in the Sams Club Technology division specialize in applying machine learning and artificial intelligence to solve problems across Merchandising Marketing Club Operations Finance eCommerce and Security You will have the opportunity to work with a high caliber team from a variety of disciplines to build new software and radically change our business Data Scientists work as part of an Experience Team to develop and deploy advanced algorithms at scale You will support and enable the entire project lifecycle including problem discovery with business clients algorithmic design coding validation deployment testing and monitoring Data Scientists adhere to agile software development standards through rapid prototyping iterative development and incremental deployment of capabilities Development is performed in Sprints and Data Scientists are held accountable to engineering excellence standardsltbrgtltbrgtKey ResponsibilitiesltbrgtltulgtltligtPerforms research and applies new techniques and concepts to solve problemsltligtltligtUnderstands and translates business and functional needs into AIML problem statementsltligtltligtDevelops custom ML models to drive innovative business solutionsltligtltligtManages and integrates complex data sets from multiple disparate data sourcesltligtltligtWrites complex queries and extracts data to build robust data pipelinesltligtltligtCollaborates with Engineering teams to integrate algorithms into tools processes and interfacesltligtltligtPerforms exploratory data analysis and develops models to identify trends and opportunitiesltligtltligtBuilds and deploys reusable services and utilities that can be leveraged by a wide range of applicationsltligtltligtApplies innovative and scientific approaches to augment and automate business decisionsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtSkillsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtProficiency in machine learning algorithms such as multiclass classifications decision trees support vector machines deep learning and anomaly detectionltligtltligtStrong understanding of probability and statistical models generative and descriptive modelsltligtltligtAbility to run experiments scientifically and analyze resultsltligtltligtAbility to effectively communicate technical concepts and results to business audiences in a comprehensive mannerltligtltligtAbility to collaborate effectively across multiple teams and stakeholders including analytics teams development teams product management and operationsltbrgtltligtltulgtMust Havesltbrgtltulgtltligt13 years experience in building ML based models in a professional environmentltligtltligtExperience with productionizing Machine Learning solutions in cloud environmentltligtltligtStrong background in Statistics and Operational ResearchltligtltligtFamiliarity with Deep Learning algorithmsltligtltligtProficiency in coding Python RltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred QualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtData science machine learning optimization models Masters degree in Machine Learning Computer Science Information Technology Operations Research Statistics Applied Mathematics Econometrics Successful completion of one or more assessments in Python Spark Scala or R using opensource frameworks eg Scikit learn TensorFlow TorchltbrgtltbrgtWere virtualltbrgtltbrgtWorking virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions remove location barriers across our global team be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting Today we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team Of course being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success Well collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purposeltbrgtltbrgtBenefits ampamp PerksltbrgtltbrgtBeyond competitive pay you can receive incentive awards for your performance Other great benefits include 401k match stock purchase plan paid maternity and parental leave PTO multiple health plans associate discounts and much moreltbrgtltbrgtEqual Opportunity EmployerltbrgtltbrgtWalmart Inc is an Equal Opportunity Employer  By Choice We believe we are best equipped to help our associates customers and the communities we serve live better when we really know them That means understanding respecting and valuing diversity unique styles experiences identities ideas and opinions  while being inclusive of all peopleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtMinimum QualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltemgtltemgtOutlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no minimum qualifications ltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltemgtOption 1 Bachelors degree in Statistics Economics Analytics Mathematics Computer Science Information Technology or related field and 2ltbrgtltbrgtyears experience in an analytics or related field Option 2 Masters degree in Statistics Economics Analytics Mathematics Computer ScienceltbrgtltbrgtInformation Technology or related field Option 3 4 years experience in an analytics or related field Preferred QualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltemgtOutlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no preferred qualifications ltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltemgtData science machine learning optimization models Masters degree in Machine Learning Computer Science Information Technology Operations Research Statistics Applied Mathematics Econometrics Successful completion of one or more assessments in Python Spark Scala or R Using open source frameworks for example scikit learn tensorflow torch Primary Location2101 SE SIMPLE SAVINGS DR BENTONVILLE AR 727124304 United States of America
